name: Desolate City: The Bloody Dawn Enhanced Edition
description: It seemed to be a normal day at Gray Bay. While law student Lisa was doing her part-time job in a pizzeria, an experimental project had made great progress in a research facility on the other side of the city, but later it was not proceeding as the researchers were expecting...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Pentium 4 1.0 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 or higher resolution DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible
